name: KALKYLATOP
description: The point of KALKYLATOP is simple: reach the target number by pressing every button on the KALKYLATOP. What is the KALKYLATOP? It is a calculator. The thing that will help you out the most in this game is the fact that numbers are rounded down. This means, for instance, that 7.95 becomes 7 and 5.01 becomes 5.
